REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0052 reute h f BC-INTERLEAF-<LEAF>-INTR 03-11 0073

TEXT.TITLE: INTERLEAF <LEAF> INTRODUCES NEW SOFTWARE
TEXT.BODY: Interleaf Inc said it will introduce a series of new software packages that allow users to build electronic publishing systems comprised of personal computers, workstations and mainframe computers. In addition, the company said it will announce a software program that lets users create documents in different languages or mix languages within a single document. Reuter
